channel.title: Activating Music
channel.description:
How would i get a command to play the music in mopar??? so then i could add that into a void and attach the void to the sendquest then the case so when i click it it plays a song thats in like
programfiles>mopar>music>track1
???????sorta like a dirty hack lol
